languages.text: "Возможно, вам будет интересно узнать, что за обедом группа офицеров обсуждала мрачный слух — явление призрака Лорд-капитана Теодоры на борту. Да, вы не ослышались. Говорят, она бродит по палубам, утаскивая членов команды с собой в небытие. По кораблю уже пробежала волна беспокойства, так как аномалию якобы видели в разных отсеках — на расстоянии километров друг от друга".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, вам будет интересно узнать, что за обедом группа офицеров обсуждала мрачный слух — явление призрака Лорда-капитана Теодоры на борту. Да, вы не ослышались. Говорят, она бродит по палубам, утаскивая членов команды с собой в небытие. По кораблю уже пробежала волна беспокойства, так как аномалию якобы видели в разных отсеках — на расстоянии километров друг от друга".

languages.text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, вам будет интересно узнать, что за обедом группа офицеров обсуждала мрачный слух — явление призрака Лорд-капитана Теодоры на борту. Да, вы не ослышались. Говорят, она бродит по палубам, утаскивая членов команды с собой в небытие. По кораблю уже пробежала волна беспокойства, так как аномалию якобы видели в разных отсеках — на расстоянии километров друг от друга".

traits.locale_text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers were discussing a grim rumor over lunch. Apparently the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora was seen on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members into oblivion. There is an air of concern throughout the ship as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometers apart."

"You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumor over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire miles apart."

Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire miles apart."

"You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."

languages.text: «Tal vez le interese conocer un rumor un tanto siniestro que un grupo de oficiales estaba debatiendo durante la comida. Por lo que dicen, se ha avistado al fantasma de la Lady Capitana Theodora a bordo recientemente. Como lo oye. Dicen que vaga por las cubiertas y arrastra a cualquier tripulante despistado a su muerte. La inquietud se propaga por la nave, especialmente porque la anomalía ha sido vista en secciones diferentes, algunas separadas por kilómetros».
languages.original_text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez le interese conocer un rumor un tanto siniestro que un grupo de oficiales estaba debatiendo durante la comida. Por lo que dicen, se ha avistado al fantasma de la Lady Capitana Theodora a bordo recientemente. Como lo oye. Dicen que vaga por las cubiertas y arrastra a cualquier tripulante despistado a su muerte. La inquietud se propaga por la nave, especialmente porque la anomalía ha sido vista en secciones diferentes, algunas separadas por kilómetros».

languages.text: “午餐的时候，几位军官讨论着某个可怕的传言，您可能会有兴趣。有消息声称，最近有人在船上看到了西奥多拉领主舰长的鬼魂。没错，您没听错，他们说她的鬼魂在甲板上出没，把那些不听话的船员丢入湮灭之中。现在整艘船的船员都惴惴不安，因为船上很多区域都报告称看到了这种灵异现象，而且这些现象发生的地点有时会相距数公里之远。”
languages.original_text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."

traits.locale_text: “午餐的时候，几位军官讨论着某个可怕的传言，您可能会有兴趣。有消息声称，最近有人在船上看到了西奥多拉领主舰长的鬼魂。没错，您没听错，他们说她的鬼魂在甲板上出没，把那些不听话的船员丢入湮灭之中。现在整艘船的船员都惴惴不安，因为船上很多区域都报告称看到了这种灵异现象，而且这些现象发生的地点有时会相距数公里之远。”

languages.text: 「士官の集団が昼食中にしている不気味な噂話が気になるのですね。最近、船内で前ロード・キャプテンのシオドーラ様の亡霊を見たという噂があると。えぇ、聞いた通りですよ。シオドーラ様がデッキに出没し、悪さをするクルーを忘却の彼方に引きずり込むとか。この件はさまざまなセクション、時には数キロ離れた場所でも報告があるので、船内全体に不安が広がっています」
languages.original_text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."

traits.locale_text: 「士官の集団が昼食中にしている不気味な噂話が気になるのですね。最近、船内で前ロード・キャプテンのシオドーラ様の亡霊を見たという噂があると。えぇ、聞いた通りですよ。シオドーラ様がデッキに出没し、悪さをするクルーを忘却の彼方に引きずり込むとか。この件はさまざまなセクション、時には数キロ離れた場所でも報告があるので、船内全体に不安が広がっています」

languages.text: "Es interessiert Euch vielleicht, dass eine Gruppe von Offizieren beim Essen über ein schlimmes Gerücht geredet hat. Angeblich ist vor Kurzem der Geist von Lord Captain Theodora an Bord gesichtet worden. Ja, Ihr habt richtig gehört. Sie spukt angeblich über die Decks und zieht missratene Crewmitglieder in den Tod. Im ganzen Schiff herrscht schon Unruhe, weil die Anomalie in verschiedenen Sektionen aufgetreten ist, manchmal Kilometer voneinander entfernt."
languages.original_text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."

traits.locale_text: "Es interessiert Euch vielleicht, dass eine Gruppe von Offizieren beim Essen über ein schlimmes Gerücht geredet hat. Angeblich ist vor Kurzem der Geist von Lord Captain Theodora an Bord gesichtet worden. Ja, Ihr habt richtig gehört. Sie spukt angeblich über die Decks und zieht missratene Crewmitglieder in den Tod. Im ganzen Schiff herrscht schon Unruhe, weil die Anomalie in verschiedenen Sektionen aufgetreten ist, manchmal Kilometer voneinander entfernt."

languages.text: « J'ai appris quelque chose qui pourrait vous intéresser. Au déjeuner, un groupe d'officiers discutait d'une rumeur sinistre, comme quoi certains auraient vu une apparition de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora à bord. Oui, vous avez bien entendu. On raconte qu'elle hante les ponts et emporte les membres d'équipage isolés dans le néant. Cette histoire sème l'inquiétude dans tout le vaisseau, car l'anomalie a été signalée dans différentes sections, parfois à plusieurs kilomètres de distance. »
languages.original_text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai appris quelque chose qui pourrait vous intéresser. Au déjeuner, un groupe d'officiers discutait d'une rumeur sinistre, comme quoi certains auraient vu une apparition de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora à bord. Oui, vous avez bien entendu. On raconte qu'elle hante les ponts et emporte les membres d'équipage isolés dans le néant. Cette histoire sème l'inquiétude dans tout le vaisseau, car l'anomalie a été signalée dans différentes sections, parfois à plusieurs kilomètres de distance. »

languages.text: "Bir grup subayın yemek sırasında sözünü ettikleri can sıkıcı bir söylentiyi de duymak isteyebilirsiniz. Denildiğine göre son zamanlarda gemide Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın hayaleti görülüyormuş. Evet, doğru duydunuz. Güvertelere musallat olduğu, emirlere uymayan tayfaları boşluğa çektiği söyleniyor. Endişe tüm gemiye yayılmış durumda. Anomaliyle ilgili raporlar, farklı bölümlerden geliyor ki bu bölümlerin bazıları arasında kilometreler var."
languages.original_text: "You may be interested to know that a group of officers was discussing a grim rumour over lunch. Word has it the apparition of Lord Captain Theodora has been sighted on board lately. Yes, you heard right. They say she is haunting the decks, dragging wayward crew members off into oblivion. Disquiet has spread throughout the ship, as the anomaly has been reported in different sections, sometimes entire kilometres apart."

traits.locale_text: "Bir grup subayın yemek sırasında sözünü ettikleri can sıkıcı bir söylentiyi de duymak isteyebilirsiniz. Denildiğine göre son zamanlarda gemide Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın hayaleti görülmüş. Evet, doğru duydunuz. Güvertelere musallat olduğu, emirlere uymayan mürettebat üyelerini boşluğa doğru çektiği söyleniyor. Endişe tüm gemiye yayılmış durumda. Anomali hakkında raporlar farklı bölümlerden geliyor ki bu bölümlerin bazılarının arasında kilometreler var."
